phrases: There is no way he would like someone like me.
Why are you assuming you have lost?
You have already lost in spirit.
It is Ichika I am up against.
She is cute and social, and she is popular with the guys.
And she has the strength to believe in her own dreams.
If I were a guy, I would choose her.
Not that I did not already know that I am cute.
That just makes him even more messed up for not immediately going out with me.
How much courage does he think it took me?
So you have not yet, have you?
He will never get it through his thick skull unless you tell him.
I said I would do it if I scored the highest on our exams.
Or if I could bake good bread.
I kept making up excuses to put it off.
It is not Ichika's fault or anyone else's.
Go ahead and stay cooped up like this forever.
You and I really are on completely different wavelengths.
But still, I thought you were a rival.
You are no match for me?
You said we are rivals in love, did not you?
You had no trouble admitting that I am cute.
Wait, do not you think this is a bit too short?
You are the one who told me to cut it.
I know, but I have never cut it this short before.
H-Hey, where are you taking me?
There is something I want to talk to you about.
I want you to hear Miku out.
So long as Futaro-kun knows that Miku likes him,
my lie does not make any sense.
I am going to use everything I can.
This is the only way I can do it.
It is the only way I can win.
You have been here before, have not you?
When I was in elementary school.
When you were in elementary school?
That day, I wandered around this area with Rena, wherever she wanted to go.
There is no way I would not have enjoyed traveling with her,
after she said she needed me.
Before I knew it, the sun set, and it was night.
My teacher from school was supposed to come pick me up.
I got to wait in an empty room at the hotel Rena was staying at.
Now it is just a nice memory.
I only figured I would tell you because you might be plotting something.
But I am tired of that.
I am done playing your little game, Miku.
It is safe to assume you were the Miku that I met in the school hallway the other day.
Why did you lie to me?
You must have figured it out.
That girl from six years ago was one of us.
Do you remember which good luck charm we bought together six years ago?
You are lying, are not you?
I cannot trust you right now.
Let us go back before we catch a cold.
Man, did not the weather forecast say it was going to be clear?
You were lost, were not you?
Also, what is the plan tomorrow?
Y-You can go next, then, Yotsuba.
I am glad I did not go.
You are really going all-in, huh?
I am going to throw it out since it is too much for me.
do not you have something to say to Miku?
We are assembling in the main hall in thirty minutes.
Tell me what is going on.
I-It is not a big deal, right?
Yeah, this is just another day for us.
Apparently, we are deciding on our elective itinerary for tomorrow, too.
Sorry for talking out of turn.
Making Fu-kun worry is the last thing I want.
And you need to stop running away like that.
Miku, you cannot keep this up forever.
Guys, let us make things clear.
All of us are looking for a chance to be alone with Futaro-kun.
That is what I have been saying this whole time.
None of us are going to get what we want if we keep this up.
I am sure that is not anyone's wish.
You hear me out too, Yotsuba.
He is not here anymore, is he?
Assemble at hotel lobby 820 Bus to Uji Station
Assemble at hotel lobby 830 Bus to Kenninji Temple
Assemble at hotel lobby 800 Bus to Tokuyou Tea Class
Course D Explore places of significance to Oda Nobunaga 8:00
Assemble at hotel lobby 850 Bus to Honnouji Temple
We have elective field trips on our last day.
We are choosing from one of five courses.
Why do not we each choose one of the five?
The only person who gets a chance
is the one who happens to be on the same course as Futaro-kun.
Let us leave it all to luck.
There will not be any hard feelings that way.
Are really we really going to do this after all that scheming?
It is only a one in five chance.
I do not know how to face Futaro-kun right now.
So I want my odds to be lower.
I think this is the best option.
We should have done this from the beginning.
Can we just point like usual?
I bet we will all choose something different anyway.
Yo, Uesugi, which course are we choosing tomorrow?
You know, like, Honnouji Temple and samurai graves and stuff.
I do not care about that!
You like Japanese history too, huh, Ichika-san?
Students on Course E, we have arrived at our destination, the Studio Park.
Why did she decide she wanted to switch courses with me?
Ichika was supposed to be the one here.
Not that I think this is enough to make up for what I did...
You got to watch where you are going.
I am sorry, Nino, I just cannot.
She is trying to run away again.
Would you like to try on samurai clothes?
Would you like to try on samurai clothes?
I just called in sick so I could keep an eye on those two.
You are not here to mess with her again, are you?
I bailed with a stomachache, too.
I do not expect you to believe me.
Even if I cannot be forgiven for what I did,
I want to make things right as much as I can before the end of the last day.
I cannot believe you are also here to support Miku, Itsuki.
Are you sure you do not want to tell him that you were the girl he met six years ago?
Ichika and Nino are here, too.
I guess we are all here on Course E.
Those two guys are in the way.
I will go deal with them.
Ichika, try to get Miku to wear the samurai clothes while she is here.
Hey, you are great at impersonating Miku, are not you?
May I try on the samurai clothes, too?
Maeda and Takeda are late as hell.
And Miku said she would wait, but she is gone.
Considering what happened on the first day, I cannot blame her.
So you did get dressed, too, huh?
I was not planning to, but the staff were weirdly enthusiastic about it.
I do not look weird, do I?
I do not know what to do with them.
Looks like Ichika managed to do her part.
It is going to go back down!
Do not go thinking I am giving you to her.
What is she going to do about her underwear?
You told me to watch where I was going.
You should pay attention to your surroundings, too.
I told you, I am sorry.
I will apologize to the staff.
Before we knew it, we were talking like normal again.
It is strange, given everything that happened.
It is like I stop worrying about silly things when I am with him.
Like the fact that I am soaked all the way down to my underwear.
Please use this if you are in need
This paper bag is from an underwear shop.
I will take them up on their offer.
Good thing you had that underwear, Itsuki!
I thought I might need it in an emergency!
Let us sit down for a bit.
I think things are going well.
What do we do now, Yotsuba?
I picked up Miku's bread, but I left it back at the hotel.
I just need to hand this to Miku, right?
The last three days went by so quickly.
Although it was just two days for me.
I got to spend the last day with you.
That is good enough for me.
I am going to take one.
I seem to have a bad palate.
Honestly, I am not confident I can give you good feedback,
but I can, at least, appreciate your effort.
You must have worked so hard.
I think I have been rooting for the passive one the most
because I wanted everyone to be happy.
So I never realized how you were really feeling.
I am the one who needs to apologize the most.
My mom used to bake for me a lot.
She baked bread every day until she died.
I was reminded of that for some reason.
It was the kind of popular handmade bread that they serve at small cafes and stuff.
My dad and I loved it.
Anyway, no point talking about me right now.
I want you to tell me more.
I never knew any of this, even though we have spent so much time together.
I have been so busy thinking about myself, I did not even try to learn.
And I want you to know everything about me, too.
That spot's famous for being used as a magistrate's office in period dramas.
I am content just having been able to see it today.
I love that big bridge we just crossed, too.
Oh, and I love that, too.
Not that I did not know.
I am sorry I kept getting in your way.
Futaro-kun, I am sorry I kept lying.
I met this really interesting boy today.
And we bought all these good luck charms together.
He is still in the main hall right now.
I was bored, being all by myself.
It was just for a short while.
But I am sure I fell in love with you because of that moment.
Futaro-kun, you might not believe me anymore,
That memory is not a lie.
When I saw them together, I could not keep my cool.
Before I knew it, I would jumped on him.
I kind of get how you feel now.
If things had happened at slightly different times,
our roles might have been reversed.
I am sorry for being so condescending.
That is not true at all!
But at the same time, I realized how stupid I am.
Miku refused to hold anything against you the whole time.
Going behind each other's backs, dragging each other down...
We are not getting anything out of fighting each other.
We are not enemies, are we?
Let us go apologize to Miku.
I am sure we can be on even better terms than before.
We get to talk about something we all like, for once.
I really do love my family.
I thought something was up since I heard Ichika and Nino's voices.
Wait, let me walk through this...
Which means that I love you just now...
It was directed at my sisters hiding in there.
Y-You are just messing with me!
Are you sure about that, Miku?
You would finally managed to tell him how you feel.
I am not like a certain someone
who is stupid enough to go charging in when I do not even stand a chance.
Besides, Futaro's not as dense as we think.
So, Yotsuba, thanks for the bread.
I was worried for a while.
Also, I think these are yours, right, Itsuki?
I guess falling in love is painful.
What they did and talked about from then until our meeting time
is something only they would know.
I did not even listen to what you had to say.
You are the worst, glaring at a girl like that.
I was so sad, you know.
I was the one who asked you, after all.
Do you take the groom to be your wedded husband, to have and to hold from this day on,
Oh, the kiss is coming up.
for better for worse, for richer for poorer, in sickness and in health,
to love, cherish, and to obey, till death do you part?
You may now kiss the bride.
Five years ago, when we went to Grandpa's place,
Now I should not have to worry about being fooled by them anymore.
That must have been the day
that I started to feel she was special.
